name: Running Out of Space (CDBD)
description:
Background:

As population grows, the earth is running out of space. Thus your job is to try to find a new home by running out of space! 

Guide:

Player Movement - 'W' 'S' 'A' 'D' or Arrow Keys

Shoot - Mouse Left Click or Press Ctrl Key

Whenever player jumps, it loses its jumping points! When jumping points go to zero, the player will fall and die. Shoot meteor to collect more jumping points!

Goal:

Get a high score!

Collect all 12 types of meteor to unlock something very cool!
